welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bay Village, where the picturesque views, charming local shops, and friendly community await you. Get ready to experience the vibrant culture and unique charm of this seaside town. Enjoy your stay and let the adventure begin!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Hopkins International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for international flights operated by Air Canada, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.
